author: The Editorial Board
title: Macron’s Biggest Reform Test
text:
French President Emmanuel Macron is facing the biggest challenge so far to his economic reform program amid nationwide strikes, and the labor disruption will get worse as the spring progresses. Having chosen this battlefield, he can’t afford to lose without jeopardizing his entire reform agenda.

Railway workers, teachers, air-traffic controllers and other government workers walked out Thursday in the largest labor action in Mr. Macron’s tenure. The strikes forced the cancellation of 30% of flights in and out of Paris, and...
